ruling: - If you equip [[Chaos Necromancer]] with [[Axe of Despair]] and you have 5 monsters in your Graveyard, the ATK of [[Chaos Necromancer]] is 2500 (1500 + 1000).
- If [[Chaos Necromancer]] is equipped with [[Megamorph]], its ATK is 0, but if [[Megamorph]] leaves play, recalculate the ATK of [[Chaos Necromancer]] using its effect.

- If [[Shield & Sword]] is activated, it reverses the original ATK & DEF of [[Chaos Necromancer]], which are both 0, then [[Chaos Necromancer]]'s effect is applied and its ATK will be 300 x the number of monsters in your Graveyard, and its DEF will be 0.
